title: Electric field lines around three charges

content.question: The electric field lines in the region surrounding charged spheres 1, 2, and 3 are shown in the figure. Five points <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="D" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>D</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="E" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>E</mtext></mrow></math> are also shown. At which of the following points is the magnitude of the electric field greatest?

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
